SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

metaface.server
Class VHMLReader

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      metaface.server.VHMLReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
class VHMLReader
extends DefaultHandler

This class is used to parse a Virtual Human Markup Language (VHML)document.

Follow this link to retrieve the Document Type Definition vhml.dtd Follow this link to retrieve an example XML file vhml_example.xml

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard
See Also:
VHMLParser
